search_results.title: Hunter S. Thompson
search_results.snippet: Hunter Stockton Thompson (July 18, 1937 – February 20, 2005) was an American journalist and author, regarded as a pioneer of New Journalism

search_results.title: Karen Hunter's Biography
search_results.snippet: Publisher and author Karen Hunter was born on April 24, 1966 in Orange, New Jersey. In 1983, she graduated from Marylawn of the Oranges Academy in South Orange ...

search_results.title: Tera W. Hunter | Department of History
search_results.snippet: Tera W. Hunter is the Edwards Professor of American History and Professor of African-American Studies, a specialist in the 19th and 20th centuries.
